title: Disconected from Friends list / chat
body:
i have this problem since 2 weeks now. 
it's like  i'm Disconected from Friends list and Chat ( even when i finish the game ) i can't talk / answer or see any conversation 
i can't invite players/friends cause i can't see my friend list ( blank ). 

it's ruining my experience. {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
Possible workaround for the empty friends list bug (for Win 10):

1. Press "Start"
2. Search "Date and Time"
3. Select "Date and Time Settings"
4. Activate "Set time automatically" and "Set time zone automatically"
5. Press "Sync now" under "Synchronise your clock"
6. Reload your client

Ty for answering 

it isn't working

The other possible solution is a clean reinstall. The easiest way to do this is through the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
